caption: A soul stepping into the frame of divine suffering, where thorns and crosses become present companions.
image_prompt: A modern figure in shadowy, Caravaggio-esque lighting, their face half-lit as if pressed by unseen thorns, hands gripping an invisible cross. Behind them, faint echoes of Caravaggio’s chiaroscuro and El Greco’s elongated forms merge—a golden, stormy sky stretching upward while deep shadows pull earthward. The scene blurs between Renaissance mastery and contemporary realism, with brushstrokes suggesting both agony and transfiguration.
